page.title: 05Yacht club (cont.)
page.content: There are three sorts of yachts,Class 1 yachts have up to 17.sq.metres of sail Class 11 yachts up to 11.3 sq. metres,and class 111 up to 7.35 sq. metres. Unlike other yachts the DN Sand Yacht is wooden and easy to build for D.I.Y. enthusiasts.A British DN Association has recently been formed by enthusiasts. The techniques of sand sailing are no different from these of sea sailing and the same set of terms are used-gybing,luffing-up,tacking, reaching etc. The rules for sand yachting are halfway between those for motor racing and those for sea sailing.Also as in motor racing crash helmets are a rule.
